DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , efficacy , acceptability eye drop formulation subject dry eye disease .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Efficacy , Acceptability Study Eye Drop Formulation Subjects With Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: Dry eye Current use eye drop dry eye least twice daily , average least 3 month Cataract , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) surgery last 12 month Need wear contact lens study , worn contact lenses last 6 month Active ocular allergy
